Contact

If you're having difficulty with tmda-cgi, the first place to look is the download directory. Check to make sure you have the latest version of tmda-cgi and that you've applied any patches that may be listed.

If your problem persists, check the tmda-user mailing list archives. Someone else may have experienced this problem and already posted a solution.

If you can't find any relevant postings, try posting to the list yourself. Those of us supporting tmda-cgi prefer to handle questions this way.

If you still can't get the help you need, you might try e-mailing us directly:

Gre7g Luterman

Jim Ramsay
